description.p: Some rogues, having received the blessing of the moon, develop subtle skills such as stealth and agility through magic, learning magic and the path of the moon. These Rogues carry out assassinations in the name of the moon and offer their victims to it. They feel a deep respect for the moon, even if their goals are sometimes misguided.

sheet.description: You enhance you fine-honed skills of stealth and agility with moons blessing and magic.

description.p: When you reach 3rd level, you gain the ability to cast spells.
Cantrips. You learn three cantrips. You learn another cantrip of your choice at 10th level.

Spell Slots. Moon light assassin spellcasting table shows how many spell slots you have to cast your Cleric spells of 1st level and higher. To cast one of these spells, you must expend a slot of the spell's level or higher. You regain all expended spell slots when you finish a long rest.
For example, if you know the 1st-level spell charm person and have a 1st-level and a 2nd-level spell slot available, you can cast charm person using either slot.
Spells Known of 1st-Level and Higher. You know three 1st-level Cleric spells of your choice.

The Spells Known column of the Moon light assassin Spellcasting table shows when you learn more Cleric spells of 1st level or higher and must be of a level for which you have spell slots. For instance, when you reach 7th level in this class, you can learn one new spell of 1st or 2nd level.
The spells you learn at 8th, 14th, and 20th level can come from any Cleric domain
Whenever you gain a level in this class, you can replace one of the cleric spells you know with another spell of your choice from the cleric spell list.

Spellcasting Ability. Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for your cleric spells, since you learn your spells through dedicated study and memorization. You use your Wisdom whenever a spell refers to your spellcasting ability. In addition, you use your Wisdom modifier when setting the saving throw DC for a cleric spell you cast and when making an attack roll with one.

center.p: Spell save DC = 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Wisdom modifier
Spell attack modifier = your proficiency bonus + your Wisdom modifier

sheet.description: Gods of light promote the ideals of rebirth and renewal, truth, vigilance, and beauty, often using the symbol of the sun.

description.p: Geceyle uyum içersindesin ve ay ışığında haraketlerin ölümcül olur.
Eğer karanlık yada loş ışık altında düşmana saldırırsan sneak atak için gerekli avantajı otomatik sağlarsın. Ve ayrıca Gece ay varsa 60ft. gece görüşü kazanırsın.
In addition, you can use Sleight of hand with advantage.
Starting at 9th level, bonus aksiyon kullanarak 1 dakika boyunca kendini ay ışığıyla sararsın. Bu süre boyunca; Rakipler sana saldırırken dezavantajlıdırlar ve fırsat saldırısı tetiklemessin.

description.p: At 13th level, you gain the ability to mark a target with power of moon. On your turn, you can mark one target. Bu hedef konsantrasyon gerektiren büyüleri yapamaz hale gelir ve tüm kaynaklardan bonus 1d6 radiant damage alır.

description.p: At 17th level, Günde 1 defa ayın gerçek yüzüne 1 dakikalığına bürününebilirsin. Bu Formdayken:
Moonstep: Her tur başlangıcında loş ışık yada gölgeye 30 ft teleport olabilirsin. Bu teleport haraket hakkından etkilenmez.
Radiant Execution: Lunar markın etkisindeki yada seni göremeyen hedefe yapılan ilk saldırı otomatik kritik olur.
Moonlight Blade: Tüm silah saldırıların radiant damage verir ve hedeflerin reaksiyonlarını kaybetmesine neden olur.
Ayın gücü damarlarında yükselir ve büyü slotların harici yeteneklerin short rest atmış gibi yenilenir.
